currentLandscape: Overall, there is a growing trend among US consumers towards increased use of sun care and skin protection products
A survey revealed that 44% of consumers reported applying skin protection more frequently than they did a year ago
Additionally, more than three-quarters of consumers now use some form of skin protection, with a majority wearing it year-round
This trend is largely attributed to the convenience of products that contain SPF
